ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Krishna Mohan Rao Dontineni is a resident of Omaha, NE, US. He has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 2 years. Currently he is employed as a Jr. Systems Engineer at First National Bank. Krishna has extensive knowledge of Dynamic Host Control protocol, Domain Name Server Protocol, VMware, Microsoft Internet Information Server, Active Directory, ODBC, Citrix Winframe, Windows 2008 R2, PRINT, Microsoft Exchange Server, AD, Windows Server 2008 R2, SNMP, Microsoft SharePoint, Microsoft SQL Server, Microsoft .NET Technology, LAN/WAN > VLAN, IP, IBM OS/2, High Availability, HP Server Hardware > HP Blade Servers, HP Server Hardware, FTP, DS0, Active Directory 2008R2, Active Directory 2003. So far Krishna has not gained any managerial experience.
